name: Planetary Defense (itch)
description:
It is up to YOU!

Defend the planet from the oncoming assault from bombs, space debris, alien invaders, and much much more. But be careful, with such a powerful arsenal you may be the planets worst enemy.

Retro Fun

This is a quick game which harks back to the RETRO ARCADE games of the past. Shoot down enemies from your satellite spinning around the planet. Bad guys explode in a fiery blast that can take out more enemies.

Don't let them hit the planet and blow chunks of it away. If they get to the core, it is literally GAME OVER.  The challenge picks up with each level, and so will your score. Get a high score and impress your friends. Got no friends? I'll be your friend!
